title: What Humans Can Learn From Trees
description: Trees don't just compete with one another for resources, they also cooperate. Scientist and author Suzanne Simard explains the surprising science of trees.
itunes:subtitle: Trees don't just compete with one another for resources, they also cooperate. Scientist and author Suzanne Simard explains the surprising science of trees.
itunes:author: PRX and Greater Good Science Center
